meta.description: Optimize transportation options to minimize pollution while meeting product demand and constraints.

params.name: pollution_per_trip
params.description: Pollution generated per trip by each transportation option

params.name: capacity_per_trip
params.description: Capacity of products each transportation option can carry per trip

params.name: total_demand
params.description: Total product demand to be transported

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each transportation option

vars.name: choose_van_or_ev
vars.description: Binary variable to choose between vans and electric vehicles

objective.name: minimize_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution_per_trip[option] * trips[option] for option in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution generated by all trips

constraints.name: total_demand_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity_per_trip[option] * trips[option] for option in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
constraints.description: Ensure total transported products meet or exceed demand

constraints.name: max_pollution_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(pollution_per_trip[option] * trips[option] for option in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
constraints.description: Total pollution must not exceed the maximum allowable pollution

constraints.name: trucks_minimum_usage
constraints.description: Trucks must be used at least 10 times

constraints.name: van_or_ev_choice_vans
constraints.description: Vans can only be used if choose_van_or_ev is 1

constraints.name: van_or_ev_choice_electric_vehicles
constraints.description: Electric vehicles can only be used if choose_van_or_ev is 0
